00055 inline u16 strToU16(u08* str)
00056 {
00057     U16 *num;
00058     num = (U16*)str;
00059     return num->all;
00060 }
00061

00067     S16* num;
00068     num = (S16*)str;
00069     return num->all;
00070 }

00118     U16* num;
00119     num = (U16*)str;

00121     return str;
